title: Quick Tomato Pasta
instructions: Fill large pot with water and bring to boil for 5 minutes
Add pasta and cook, stirring every 2 minutes for 8 minutes
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in pan for 1 minute
Add minced garlic and sauté, stirring constantly for 2 minutes
Add chopped tomatoes and cook, stirring every minute for 5 minutes
Season with salt and pepper, stir for 1 minute
Drain pasta and mix with tomato sauce, tossing for 2 minutes
Garnish with fresh basil and let rest for 1 minute before serving

title: Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Let butter soften at room temperature for 2 minutes
Butter one side of each bread slice, taking 2 minutes to spread evenly
Slice cheese carefully and arrange on bread for 2 minutes
Season cheese with salt and pepper for 1 minute
Assemble sandwiches with buttered sides out, press gently for 1 minute
Heat pan over medium heat for 1 minute until ready
Place sandwiches in pan and cook for 3 minutes until golden
Flip carefully and cook other side for 3 minutes
Remove from heat, cut diagonally and let cool for 1 minute before serving

title: Simple Rice Bowl
instructions: Rinse rice until water runs clear for 2 minutes
Bring water to boil and add rice, cook for 12 minutes stirring occasionally
While rice cooks, beat eggs for 1 minute until smooth
Heat oil in large pan for 1 minute
Scramble eggs slowly, stirring constantly for 3 minutes until fluffy
Add minced garlic to eggs and stir for 1 minute
Add cooked rice to pan with eggs and mix thoroughly for 2 minutes
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, stir continuously for 2 minutes
Continue stirring and cooking for 3 more minutes until well combined
Chop green onions and garnish, let rest for 2 minutes before serving

title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread slices for 2 minutes until golden brown
Cut avocado carefully and remove pit, taking 1 minute
Mash avocado slowly with fork for 1 minute until smooth
Add lemon juice, salt, and pepper, mix for 30 seconds
Spread avocado mixture evenly on toast for 30 seconds
Wash and halve cherry tomatoes for 1 minute
Arrange tomatoes on toast carefully for 30 seconds
Drizzle olive oil and let flavors settle for 30 seconds before serving

title: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cut chicken into small uniform pieces for 3 minutes
Prepare vegetables by chopping for 2 minutes
Heat oil in wok over high heat for 1 minute
Add chicken and stir continuously for 5 minutes until golden
Push chicken to one side, add minced garlic and ginger for 1 minute
Add vegetables and stir-fry, tossing every 30 seconds for 4 minutes
Add soy sauce and toss everything together for 2 minutes
Continue stir-frying for final 2 minutes until heated through
Serve immediately over pre-cooked rice

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Wash and chop tomatoes into chunks for 2 minutes
Peel and dice cucumber carefully for 2 minutes
Slice red onion very thinly for 1 minute
Combine all vegetables in large bowl, toss gently for 1 minute
Add olives and mix for 30 seconds
Crumble feta cheese over salad for 1 minute
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano in small bowl for 1 minute
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently for 1 minute
Let flavors meld for final 1 minute 30 seconds before serving

title: Banana Pancakes
instructions: Mash bananas thoroughly in bowl for 2 minutes until completely smooth
Beat in eggs one at a time for 1 minute until well combined
Add flour, salt, and cinnamon, whisk for 1 minute
Let batter rest while heating butter in pan for 1 minute
Pour small amounts of batter to make pancakes
Cook first side for 2 minutes until bubbles form
Flip carefully and cook second side for 2 minutes
Repeat process for remaining batter, about 2 more minutes
Drizzle with honey and let cool for 1 minute before serving

title: Quesadilla
instructions: Dice bell pepper and onion finely for 2 minutes
Heat oil in pan for 1 minute
Sauté vegetables, stirring every 30 seconds for 4 minutes until soft
Remove vegetables and set aside for 30 seconds
Grate cheese if needed for 1 minute
Place cheese and vegetables on one tortilla for 1 minute
Top with second tortilla and press gently for 30 seconds
Cook in pan for 2 minutes until bottom is crispy
Flip carefully and cook other side for 2 minutes
Cut into wedges and serve with salsa and sour cream

title: Tuna Salad
instructions: Open and drain tuna completely for 1 minute
Place tuna in large bowl and flake with fork for 1 minute
Finely chop celery stalks for 2 minutes
Dice red onion very small for 1 minute
Add vegetables to tuna and mix for 1 minute
Add mayonnaise and stir thoroughly for 1 minute
Squeeze lemon juice and add to mixture for 30 seconds
Season with salt and pepper, mix well for 30 seconds
Prepare lettuce leaves and let salad chill for 1 minute before serving

title: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Chop onion and garlic finely for 3 minutes
Heat oil in large pot for 1 minute
Sauté onion, stirring every minute for 4 minutes until soft
Add garlic and stir constantly for 1 minute until fragrant
Chop mixed vegetables while aromatics cook for 3 minutes
Add vegetables to pot and stir for 2 minutes
Pour in broth and bring to boil over 3 minutes
Reduce heat and simmer, stirring every 3 minutes for 15 minutes
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs, stir for 1 minute
Let simmer for final 2 minutes before serving hot
